recommendations: John Colley ‚ÄúNick is always to be found at the cutting edge of business, technology and processes. He is quick to understand what is important and what is changing and therefore what is going to disrupt. With Blockchain, Nick is leading the way in understanding and explaining how this technology is going to turn the financial services industry inside out. I always enjoy working with Nick and he never ceases to add value. Its my pleasure to recommend him unconditionally.‚Äù

Derek Field ‚ÄúDigital Boom are at the very bowspit of technology, if you are unclear or even confused about the impact Blockchain and Ethereum might have on your business make immediate contact with Nick who is the most clear thinking practitioner you will ever meet. Nick is a dynamic deal maker and foremost entrepreneur of the digital age, truly results and profit driven, there is no-one better to align your business‚Äù
